Docs.summary: Reads the [deviceFilters Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fb323b9-675b-48de-861b-8998fa0c51ba) section of a configuration file that specifies the set of device filters for use with ASP.NET mobile controls. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
Docs.permission: para operação em um ambiente hospedado. Valor de demanda: ; valor de permissão: .

block.para: Instâncias de classes que herdam a classe deve ser thread-safe e sem monitoração de estado. O método deve ser chamado de vários threads simultaneamente. Consulte para obter mais informações sobre herança.

Docs.param: The parent node in the configuration file, or ( in Visual Basic) if creating the parent node.
Docs.summary: Creates a dictionary of the device filter information contained in the specified by the parameter. If the object referenced by the property is not , then dictionary entries are appended to the parent dictionary. This method supports the .NET Framework infrastructure. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
Docs.returns: A dictionary of the device filter information contained in the specified .
